description: Tarot cards and basic information about them

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.description: The Ace of Wands symbolizes new beginnings, inspiration, and potential. It represents the spark of creativity and the start of a new project.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.description: The Two of Wands represents planning, progress, and future possibilities. It signifies the importance of setting goals and looking ahead.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.description: The Three of Wands symbolizes expansion, foresight, and exploration. It represents the growth that comes from new opportunities and adventures.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.description: The Four of Wands represents celebration, harmony, and homecoming. It signifies a period of stability and joy, often in the context of relationships.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.description: The Five of Wands symbolizes competition, conflict, and challenges. It represents the struggle for power and the importance of collaboration.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.description: The Six of Wands represents victory, recognition, and success. It signifies the achievement of goals and the respect of others.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.description: The Seven of Wands symbolizes perseverance, defense, and maintaining control. It represents standing up for oneself and facing challenges head-on.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.description: The Eight of Wands represents speed, action, and swift progress. It signifies movement and the rapid unfolding of events.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.description: The Nine of Wands symbolizes resilience, endurance, and courage. It represents the strength to push through adversity and the importance of perseverance.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.description: The Ten of Wands represents burden, responsibility, and hard work. It signifies the need to delegate or let go of unnecessary burdens.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.description: The Page of Wands symbolizes enthusiasm, exploration, and a thirst for adventure. It represents the desire to pursue passions and creative endeavors.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.description: The Knight of Wands represents action, adventure, and impulsiveness. It signifies a dynamic energy and the pursuit of new experiences.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.description: The Queen of Wands symbolizes confidence, passion, and charisma. She represents a nurturing and supportive energy that inspires others.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.description: The King of Wands represents leadership, vision, and entrepreneurship. He signifies the ability to inspire and motivate others.

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.description: The Ace of Cups symbolizes love, compassion, and emotional fulfillment. It represents new beginnings in relationships and creative expression.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.description: The Two of Cups represents partnership, unity, and connection. It signifies mutual respect and deep emotional bonds.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.description: The Three of Cups symbolizes celebration, friendship, and community. It represents joyful gatherings and shared experiences.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.description: The Four of Cups represents contemplation, apathy, and reevaluation. It signifies a need to reflect on one's feelings and desires.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.description: The Five of Cups symbolizes loss, grief, and regret. It represents the importance of acknowledging emotions while also recognizing what remains.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.description: The Six of Cups represents nostalgia, childhood, and memories. It signifies the importance of reconnecting with the past and embracing joy.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.description: The Seven of Cups symbolizes choices, fantasies, and illusions. It represents the need to discern between dreams and reality.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.description: The Eight of Cups represents walking away, letting go, and seeking deeper meaning. It signifies a journey towards emotional fulfillment.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.description: The Nine of Cups symbolizes contentment, satisfaction, and emotional stability. It represents the realization of desires and inner peace.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.description: The Ten of Cups represents happiness, harmony, and emotional fulfillment. It signifies the achievement of lasting love and family connections.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.description: The Page of Cups symbolizes creativity, intuition, and emotional exploration. It represents the willingness to embrace new feelings and experiences.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.description: The Knight of Cups represents romance, charm, and idealism. It signifies the pursuit of dreams and following one's heart.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.description: The Queen of Cups symbolizes empathy, compassion, and emotional depth. She represents nurturing and the importance of listening to intuition.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.description: The King of Cups represents emotional maturity, wisdom, and balance. He signifies the ability to manage feelings and support others.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.description: The Ace of Swords symbolizes clarity, truth, and new ideas. It represents the power of the mind and the importance of clear communication.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.description: The Two of Swords represents indecision, choices, and blocked emotions. It signifies the need to confront dilemmas and find balance.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.description: The Three of Swords symbolizes heartbreak, sorrow, and emotional pain. It represents the need for healing and acceptance.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.description: The Four of Swords represents rest, contemplation, and recovery. It signifies the importance of taking time for reflection and healing.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.description: The Five of Swords symbolizes conflict, defeat, and tension. It represents the consequences of winning at all costs.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.description: The Six of Swords represents transition, movement, and journey. It signifies moving away from difficulty towards a better situation.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.description: The Seven of Swords symbolizes deception, stealth, and strategy. It represents the need for caution and the importance of honesty.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.description: The Eight of Swords represents restriction, confusion, and feeling trapped. It signifies the need to recognize one's power and potential.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.description: The Nine of Swords symbolizes anxiety, worry, and sleepless nights. It represents the mental burden of fears and doubts.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.description: The Ten of Swords represents betrayal, endings, and loss. It signifies the need to accept and release pain to move forward.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.description: The Page of Swords symbolizes curiosity, intellect, and new ideas. It represents the eagerness to learn and explore new concepts.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.description: The Knight of Swords represents action, haste, and determination. It signifies the pursuit of truth and the courage to confront challenges.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.description: The Queen of Swords symbolizes independence, perception, and clarity. She represents the ability to see through illusions and make sound decisions.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.description: The King of Swords represents intellect, authority, and strategic thinking. He signifies the importance of logic and fairness in decision-making.

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.description: The Ace of Pentacles symbolizes prosperity, opportunity, and material gain. It represents the potential for new ventures and financial success.

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.description: The Two of Pentacles represents balance, multitasking, and adaptability. It signifies the ability to manage resources effectively.

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.description: The Three of Pentacles symbolizes teamwork, collaboration, and skill. It represents the importance of working together to achieve common goals.

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.description: The Four of Pentacles represents security, stability, and control. It signifies a need to hold onto resources and protect what one has.

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.description: The Five of Pentacles symbolizes hardship, loss, and financial struggles. It represents the need for support and the importance of community.

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.description: The Six of Pentacles represents generosity, charity, and giving. It signifies the importance of sharing wealth and helping others.

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.description: The Seven of Pentacles symbolizes patience, evaluation, and long-term success. It represents the need to assess progress and make necessary adjustments.

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.description: The Eight of Pentacles represents diligence, craftsmanship, and skill development. It signifies the importance of hard work and dedication to one's craft.

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.description: The Nine of Pentacles symbolizes independence, self-sufficiency, and luxury. It represents the enjoyment of the fruits of one's labor.

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.description: The Ten of Pentacles represents legacy, inheritance, and family ties. It signifies the importance of building a lasting foundation for future generations.

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.description: The Page of Pentacles symbolizes ambition, diligence, and new opportunities. It represents a desire to learn and grow in practical matters.

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.description: The Knight of Pentacles represents hard work, responsibility, and reliability. He signifies the importance of being thorough and dedicated in endeavors.

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.description: The Queen of Pentacles symbolizes nurturing, practicality, and abundance. She represents the importance of caring for oneself and others.

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.description: The King of Pentacles represents wealth, stability, and success. He signifies the importance of being grounded and responsible in financial matters.
